_do_not_edit_this_file: THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED, AND SHOULD NOT BE EDITED. Edit `cogs.toml` in the repository root instead.
author: odinair
install_msg: **This cog must be configured before use with `[p]misctools`.**
short: Your bot's trusty Swiss army knife of small but useful utilities
description:
**IMPORTANT:** This cog splits its available commands into multiple sets that can be dynamically loaded and unloaded to reduce the chance for any potential conflicts with other cogs. As such, this cog doesn't load all available commands by default, but must instead be specifically loaded with `[p]misctools`.

This cog features the following utilities:
• Cog debugging related utilities
• Message retrieval
• Permission breakdowns
• Semi-accurate ping timings
• General bot statistics
• XKCD comic retrieval

.. and much more; refer to `[p]misctools list` for the full list of available toolsets.
